document:
<sentence id="s1" text="In parallel, we recently reported that li>Cc2d1a-deficient mice present with cognitive and social deficits, hyperactivity and anxiety.">
<sentence id="s2" text="We generated li>Cc2d1b knockout (KO), li>Cc2d1a/1b double heterozygous and double KO mice, then performed behavioral studies to analyze learning and memory, social interactions, anxiety, and hyperactivity.">
